getSpi().Description: Get the SPI that caused a collision.

ClassDesc: Thrown to indicate that a requested SPI is in use. The combination of remote InetAddress and SPI must be unique across all apps on one device. If this error is encountered, a new SPI is required before a transform may be created. This error can be avoided by calling @B_android#net#IpSecManager#allocateSecurityParameterIndex_E@.
